channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: KEF Takes The Covers Off The Second Generation Of The Muo Portable Bluetooth Speaker
item.description: KEF's new Muo Bluetooth speaker comes in seven vibrant colors and with a battery that can play for up to 24 hours. It can connect with other speakers ...

item.title: Bungie’s ‘Marathon’ Not At Sony’s New State Of Play, Next Look Months Away
item.description: Fans hoping for Marathon information at Sony's State of Play tomorrow are not going to get any, and won't for a while.

item.title: AI Coding Boom Brings Faster Releases—and Bigger Security Risks
item.description: AI coding assistants speed development but introduce 2–3x more vulnerabilities. Security must evolve with AI to keep software safe at machine speed.

item.title: Can Abundance Thinking Future-Proof Your Legal Career?
item.description: AI is reshaping law. Entrepreneurial firms that embrace abundance and empower young lawyers to network will thrive, while scarcity mindsets risk falli...

item.title: What Time Does Gary Oldman’s ‘Slow Horses’ Season 5 Begin Streaming?
item.description: “Slow Horses,” starring Gary Oldman, Jack Lowden and Kristen Scott Thomas, is back this week with Season 5. What time does the hit series begin stream...

item.title: Without compromise

item.title: Ject!
